document_data.name: the Scarlet Keep
document_data.mainbody: The '''Scarlet Keep''' was a military school founded in [[Kourmira]] in [[1374 DR]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste}}
document_data.Activities: The military academy was used to train warriors of the [[Tuigan]] in methods of advanced strategic warfare.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Priest]]s of the [[Red Knight]] were selected to operate the school.
